name: Planet of Lost Dinosaurs
description:
Story

"Hyper Saeen" is a young T-rex, freshly transferred from his home planet to the new dinosaur world, the planet "Earth Zero". Upon landing, the robot overlords of "Earth Zero" have dispatched him on a tough mission, to collect scattered bio material that was lost during cargo. Throughout the 5 areas, "Hyper Saeen" has to run against time and collected the precious bio material before the items turn to dust.

Controls

WSAD to control.

Notes

Game Jam entry by Team Maximum Noobs. With all work done by Me and a lot of encouragement from Wardah, Shan E Ali and Usama. Plus a team member that was lost in the process.

Game has 5 levels, plus title and end screens. A soundtrack was also made that was done in total 15 minutes (please don't judge these compositions)

Good luck to all the teams, very grateful to the mentors plus the wonderful workshops by so many pros. Lastly, much thanks to Epiphany Games who made me fulfill my childhood dream of making a game and allowing me to commit myself to finally do it. Looking forward to a lot more games and a lot more fun!
